scripts.purge: powershell -Command "if (-not (Test-Path dist)) { mkdir dist }; if (-not (Test-Path dist\cleaned-css)) { mkdir dist\cleaned-css }; Get-ChildItem -Path 'src/styles' -Recurse -Filter '*.css' | ForEach-Object { $name = Split-Path $_.FullName -Leaf; npx purgecss --content 'src/**/*.html' 'src/**/*.js' --css $_.FullName --output ('dist/cleaned-css/' + $name) }"
